text: The play Teater Tun Siti Hasmah is about Siti Hasmah Mohamad Ali, the wife of former Malaysian Prime Minister Mahathir Mohamad. Directed by Erma Fatima, it starred Lisa Surihani, Eja, Nazim Othman, and Esma Danial. The play shows Siti Hasmah's early life as a doctor and her journey to becoming Malaysia's first lady. It was performed in November 2012 at Istana Budaya, Malaysia's main theater venue known as the "Palace of Culture." ==References== Category:Plays Category:Malaysian culture
title: Teater Tun Siti Hasmah
